Instruction: Bring a pot of water to a boil. Stir in sugar until it dissolves. Cook beets in the boiling water until they are tender, about 45 minutes; drain and let the beets cool completely.
Cut the cooled beets into 1/2-inch pieces. Take 1/2 cup of the beet cubes and set aside the remaining for future use.
Combine the beets with yogurt in a bowl and season with salt.
For improved flavor, cover the dip and refrigerate for at least 2 hours to allow the flavors to blend.
The nutritional information for this recipe is based on the total amount of cooked beets. The actual quantity of beet eaten may differ.
